description:
Unique Ability: Burr Trackers x4

\ Goathead throws a disc that bounces off walls. Upon landing on a flat surface, it launches small tracking devices in all directions.
\
These markers attach to defenders’ clothing within line of sight and range. They ping only while moving.

\
The tracker remains active until manually removed.

\
Additional Notes:
\
- The disc can be intercepted by Jäger’s ADS and Wamai’s Mag-Net.
\
- Destroyed by electrified surfaces.
\
- Works inside Mute jammers, but tracking disabled.
\
- Frozen by Tubarão.
\
- Destroyed by Surya Gate.
\
- Cannot attach to Clash if shield blocks sight.
\
- Tracks Skopos robots like Jackal.
\
- Prisma within range can mark Goathead.
